website_summaries.verdict: Made from durable plastic, this set is the best way to build a snow fort and defend it.
pros: Set includes 2 snowball makers and a snow brick maker for making forts and igloos
Comes in 4 colors: blue, green, pink, and red
Works well for small and large hands
Snowball makers have their own case
cons: Doesn't work as well with fluffy, powdery snow

customer_reviews.title: We always have snowball fights but made them by hand which was so time consuming if you're looking to have a good snowball fight
customer_reviews.text: This was an essential addition to our snow trips. We always have snowball fights but made them by hand which was so time consuming if you're looking to have a good snowball fight that lasted more than throwing 10 snowballs. It's such a simple concept but it made making snowballs so much easier and sooooo much faster.
customer_reviews.author: incubebe

customer_reviews.title: They were great!! The kids and I had snow ball ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't expecting much considering how little I paid for these toys but I was wrong! They were great!! The kids and I had snow ball fights and built brick walls. I will be buying more of these toys for the family cabin for when the cousins come to play. Super easy to use both my 3 year old and 6 year old used them without help.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Epic snowball fights and massive snow forts are the order of the day with this set. Get 2, we did.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 sets, this one is red. They work great! Snowball fights of epic proportions. Passers by want to join you when they see how much fun you are having. Build a fort in under 10 minutes with the brick maker. Make dozens of snowballs per minute and everyone of them is consistent. This is a must have winter/snow accessory set
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Who knew such a tool existed!!! My son actually requested this when I told him I was taking him to the snow. Awesome set. His cousins all loved it also. Long gone are the days of manually packing snowballs. Makes a perfectly round snowball each time and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: fahm Saechao

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy but somewhat flimsy plastic. It was great it moist snow but harder stuff caused fractures and breaks in the plastic. Kids still had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing snow ball & brick builder.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, it's till a lot of work, but makes the bricks & snow balls much faster. We don't get snow, but we bring them to all the snow events & my son loves to make snowballs for everyone. They also share them with the other kids & they love them as well. It's fun to build with the balls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mom w/ 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Parents and kids both enjoyed using it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a perfect snow ball. I'm glad I got pink cause easy to spot in the snow! Made it Super easy for my 3yr old to make a snowball!
customer_reviews.author: Kate T

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My children had a a blast with this kit over the cold wintre months. The snowball makers made building snowballs super easy. We actually made a race of how many snowballs could be made in a minute. My eldest won with over forty snowballs and my youngest, aged 8, was able to make about 30. The brick maker also worked well. However, my youngest was perturbed by the expanding sides which kept his briks from having smooth sides.
customer_reviews.author: M G-S

customer_reviews.title: ... a bit hit with the kindergarten set and was easy for them to use
customer_reviews.text: Snowball maker was a bit hit with the kindergarten set and was easy for them to use. Waiting for more snow to try out the brick maker. Quality seems good.

customer_reviews.title: Fun as long as you don't have powdery snow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make blocks.f
customer_reviews.text: The block maker doesn't work in Wisconsin for any type of snow we've had this year from heavy, wet to light and fluffy. The lighter snow goes right through the top hole and the wet stuff won't come out in a block. My son was very displeased. The snowball maker is OK but it's just as easy to make a snowball by hand.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This makes great snowballs. Nice and round and compact. The brick also makes nice compact bricks. Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great for playing in the snow for hours
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5 year old and 3 year old. The snow baller makes perfect snowballs and is easy to use. The brick is a little more difficult for them to get perfect, but that could also be the quality of the snow. They played with these for over two hours the other day and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Poulson

customer_reviews.title: Snowball maker is great, brick maker not so much
customer_reviews.text: The snowball makers are put together extremely well and work great! The brick maker cracked upon it's first day out. The kids were even picking up the snow and packing it in, not jamming it into a pile of snow to make a brick and the handle cracked. My suggestion for the brick maker is to go get a metal sheet-rock mud pan and let them use that.
customer_reviews.author: MHF

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and 4-year old daughter played outside in the snow with these for hours. My daughter usually has a very short attention span, but she loved making the snow balls for at least an hour. She also liked designing a fort/house for her daddy to build.

customer_reviews.title: cute, but a little expensive for the amount of plastic.

product_meta.title: BigWood Boards Lucky Bums Snowball Snowbrick Maker Set
product_meta.description: The Lucky Bums Plastic Snowball and Snow brick Maker Set is essential for hours of fun in the snow building forts and igloos and defending them with snowballs. Made of durable plastic, this set of snow tools provides all you need for a fun day in the snow. We know that parents may buy it for the kids but we're pretty sure the parents will be building snow bricks and perfect snow balls too! Manufacturer's limited lifetime warranty against defects in materials or workmanship.
feature_bullets: HOURS OF FUN- Quickly construct forts, snow houses, fences, walls, igloos and so much more
ESSENTIAL FOR SNOW PLAY- This set of snow tools provides all you need for a fun day in the snow
DURABLE- Made to last through multiple snowball fights
FOR EVERYONE- The snowball and snowbrick maker set is perfect for all ages
